## Data Preparation and Sample Codes for Analysis
```{r Preparation}
#install.packages('devtools');
library(devtools);
#install_github('hase62/Neoantimon');
library(Neoantimon);
```

```{r Sample VCF file}
data("sample_vcf")
print(sample_vcf, row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r Sample VCF (SV Fusion BND) file}
data("sample_sv_bnd")
print(sample_sv_bnd, row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r HLA Table for Class 1}
library(Neoantimon)
data("sample_hla_table_c1")
print(sample_hla_table_c1, row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r HLA Table for Class2}
data("sample_hla_table_c2")
print(sample_hla_table_c2, row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r RNA Expression}
data("sample_rna_exp")
print(sample_rna_exp, row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r CopyNumber Information}
data("sample_copynum")
print(sample_copynum, row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r Get Sample and Test Analysis}
TestAnalysis
```
